attributes.action: Give money to UK citizens not failing banks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you give UK born residents, over the age of 18, £100,000 each, the Billions of pounds will have to be deposited into bank accounts thus improving the banks ability to lend, allowing the public to spend with new cash and regenerate the enconomy.  This will get the money flowing far better than having to meet bank criteria to borrow 'the public money' that they have been given - come on Gordon help the Public for real.
